alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 11 at 4:47PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Most of the southeast CO Plains including El Paso, Pueblo, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers, Baca and eastern Las Animas Counties. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
